snippet.title: Mirage: Ignis Fatuus Release Window Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3192390/Mirage_Ignis_Fatuus/

As the world turns short of Mana, Mirage, the city of illusions, is in danger of collapsing! Help Kyuboy’d make his way through mind-boggling puzzles to save his hometown!

Mirage: Ignis Fatuus is a 3D spatial puzzle game that inherits the principles of the 2017 game Mirage: Illusions. This time, the player controls a cuboid, and its movement allows for more complex and interesting puzzles. RPG elements such as inventory management are added into the game, which enables the player to pick up and set objects to modify the walkable landscape, adding dynamism to the puzzles.
